DOC.detailed_description: This single-arm , single-dose study Ferriprox patient sickle cell disease . Patients find eligible visit clinic day receive drug , order reconfirm eligibility undergo baseline assessment , receive single dose 1500 mg Ferriprox fasting condition . Blood urine sample pharmacokinetic assessment collect 10-hour period . Standard safety assessment perform throughout study , patient return safety follow-up .
